name: Stickman Arrow Shooting 2
description:
Hey, shooting archers! Here’s your chance to try out Stickman Arrow Shooting 2: Multiplayer Game. Stickman, a mighty archer, is shooting off its enemies in a battle using a bow and arrow, thus showing off the awesome archery skills. Take your bow and arrow and fire away!

If stickman games for 2 players is what you are looking for, then prepare for the battle of your life! Invite your friends or family members to join you in the most epic casual game and the most amazing among two player games of all time. Develop your archery and aiming skills, and destroy your enemy using your powerful bow and arrow. Make sure to do it fast, before they kill you. Join the RHG battle and fight!

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.arrowbattleffstickman2.twoplay...
